What_is_NDAP: Ndap tih hi eng nge ni?
AboutNDAP_para1: National Data and Analytics Platform (or NDAP) hi Niti Aayog-in sorkar data a hmuh theihna leh a hman dan tihchangtlunna tura hmalakna flagship a ni.
AboutNDAP_para2: NDAP hian sorkar dataset-te awlsam taka hman theih tura siamin, data sharing standard khauh tak kalpuiin, Indian data landscape pumpuiah interoperability a awm theih nan leh user-friendly tools siamin, data delivery democratize a tum a ni.
AboutNDAP_para3: NITI Aayog hian data chu thianghlim, machine-a chhiar theih format-a host-a dah a, dataset-te inzawmkhawma hman theih a nih theih nan, dataset tinte chhunga thu awmte chipchiar taka documentation pek a, data hman awlsam zawka siam a tum a ni. {{month}} {{year}} aṭang khan, NDAP. {{sectors}} sector leh {{ministries}} Ministry hrang hrang atanga {{datasets}} dataset a host.
AboutNDAP_para4: Platform-a dataset-te hian NDAP’s in-house 5-star rating framework hmanga tarlan data quality standard tlem ber a tlin a ngai a ni.
AboutNDAP_para4_2: emaw, dataset page tina processing report emaw a ni thei bawk.
AboutNDAP_para5: NDAP-a datasets te chu Ministry of Panchayati Raj Local Government Directory Code hmangin geographical leh temporal identifier common set-a mapping hmanga inzawmkhawm theih a ni.
AboutNDAP_para6: NDAP in-built merge tool hmang hian cross-dataset analysis atan dataset 3 thleng a merge thei a ni.
AboutNDAP_para7: NDAP hmangtute chuan platform’s in-built analysis tools hmangin awlsam taka exploratory analysis atan flexible table leh visualization an siam thei a ni.
AboutNDAP_para8: NDAP hian data delivery-a user experience chu use-case relevant datasets host-in a center a, platform experience chu user friendly a nih theih nan a enkawl a, user feedback a solicit leh incorporate fo bawk.
AboutNDAP_para9: NDAP’s dataset identification process hian academia, policy, journalism, etc. lama sector expert-te hnen atanga use-case-based inputs a keng tel a, he process hian NDAP-a dataset awmte chu real-life data hmangtute mamawh nena inzawm tlat a ni tih a tichiang a ni.
AboutNDAP_para10: NDAP-a datasets te hi chiang taka buatsaih a ni a, chu chuan an mamawh dataset te chu a hmu thei a ni.
AboutNDAP_para11: Niti Aayog chuan NDAP chu a hmasa berah dahin NDAP chu a siam a, user-te hnen aṭanga input inzawmkhawm chhunzawm zel a beisei.
Terms_subtitle3: Materials - Dataset, Link, Hmanrua, Platform-a Hosted Content
terms_para1: NDAP-a thuziak dikna leh pawisa hman dan tur dik leh pawisa pek theihna tura hmalakna zawng zawng chu siam vek ni mah se, chutiang bawk chu dan sawina anga ngaih emaw, dan anga hman emaw anga ngaih tur a ni lo.
terms_para2: Engti kawng mahin Niti Aayog, India sawrkar emaw National Data and Analytics Platform emaw chuan sum senso, hlohna emaw, chhiatna emaw, a huam chin awm lovin, indirect emaw, a rah chhuah emaw, emaw, sum senso, hlohna emaw, chhiatna emaw a thlen chuan mawhphurhna emaw, mawhphurhna emaw a nei lo vang.
terms_para3: NDAP hian technical error vanga tihbuai tihtlem tumin hma a la dawn a ni.
terms_para4: Engtik lai pawhin leh a hun hunah, hun eng emaw chen emaw, a tawp thlenga siam\hat emaw, tihtawp emaw, he Website, a chhunga thu awmte, leh thilte hmuh theihna emaw, hman theihna emaw, kan duhthlanna angin, hriattirna hmasa emaw, hriat hmasak loh emaw theihna kan nei a ni.
terms_para5: Kan duhthlanna angin, eng dinhmunah pawh, eng chhan pawh emaw, eng emaw chhan emaw, hriattirna nei lo emaw, hriattirna hmasa emaw, thilte i hmuh theihna tur, Platform-a dah thilte chu i hmuh theih emaw, i hman theihna tur emaw hmangin kan titawp thei ang.
terms_para6: Heng Terms and Conditions te hi India danin a thunun ang a, a hrilhfiah ang.
terms_para7: Heng Terms and Conditions te hi kan duhthlanna angin a hun hunah kan siamthat theih a ni.
copyrightpolicy_para1: NDAP (URL Link)-a information host-a awm chu direct-a link-na kan dodal lo va, chutiang bawk chuan phalna lak hmasak a ngai lo.
copyrightpolicy_para2: NDAP-a thil langsar tak takte chu siam chhuah leh a nih chuan a dik a ngai a, zah lohna emaw, mi tibuaitu emawa hman loh tur a ni.
copyrightpolicy_para3: NDAP-a thil awmte chu hmun dangah tihchhuah leh a nih chuan, a hnuaia format-ah hian attribute theih a ni:
copyrightpolicy_para3a: Ram pum huapa data leh analytics platform: Dataset hming: Data source (hriat a nih chuan).
copyrightpolicy_para3d: Entirnan: National Data leh Analytics Platform (NDAP) te.
copyrightpolicy_para4: NDAP’s copyright nei thil manipulation hi phal a ni lo va, chutiang manipulation chu hman nawn leh emaw, siam leh emaw phal a ni lo.
copyrightpolicy_para5: NDAP hian datasets reproduction i hman dan emaw, a tum emaw a sponsor, a approved emaw endorsed emaw a nih thu vantlang hriatah i sawi thei lo va, i sawi tum pawh a ni thei lo.
ExternalMaterial_para1: He thil hi siam chhuah phalna chuan third party copyright nia hriat thil engmah a huam lo vang.
ExternalMaterial_para2: Party dangte chuan platform-a data leh information awm ṭhenkhatah hian ownership interest an nei thei bawk.
ExternalMaterial_para3: Dataset leh indicator-te chu third party-te’n an pek chu original data provider remtihna tel lova sem leh emaw, hman leh emaw theih a ni lo va, hetia tarlan aia danglam term leh condition-te pawh a awm thei bawk.
ExternalMaterial_para4: NDAP hian linked website-a thu awmte emaw, rintlakna emaw chu a mawhphurhna a ni lo va, an chhunga ngaihdan sawite chu a thlawp tlat lo.

SecAndMinIntro: Niti Aayog chuan India sorkar data hman theihna leh hman theihna tihpun nan National Data Analytics Platform, a nih loh leh NDAP a siam mek a ni. NDAP hi user-friendly web platform ni tura ruahman a ni a, sorkar data chu awlsam taka, machine-a chhiar theih format-a awlsam taka hman theihna tur a ni. Platform-a data awmte hi sector hrang hrang, hun leh hmun hrang hrangah standardized a ni a, chu chuan interoperability leh cross-sectoral analysis a siam thei a ni. NDAP hian sorkar official, academics, non-profits, leh data journalist-te bakah hmangtu hrang hrangte data mamawh a phuhruk dawn a ni. Niti Aayog chuan NDAP-a beta-version hman tlem a tichhuak a, hei hian a hmangtute tan a puih theih nan leh user feedback a khawlkhawm a ni. Data hmangtu thil tawn foregrounding hmangin, public datasets access leh hman inkara step awm zat tihtlem a nih avangin NDAP chuan research, decision-making leh policy design-a public data assets-te chanvo tihpun a tum a ni. Hun rei tak chhung atan chuan NDAP chu sorkarin a thlawp vantlang thila data ecosystem-a institution-in a thlawp chu institutionalization a nih chuan unit-level data thianghlim leh inzawmkhawm leh inzawmkhawmte khawlkhawm leh tihchhuah dan tur standard siam a pui thei a ni.

HomeA1: National Data and Analytics Platform (NDAP) hi NITI Aayog-in sorkar data hmuh theihna, leh hman dan tihchangtlunna tura hmalakna flagship a ni. User-friendly website a ni a, standardized Datasets a pe a ni. from across India’s vast landscape of administrative data and hosts them all in one place.NDAP hi hman awlsam a ni: Datasets awlsam taka zawn, chhui leh download theih a ni a, platform-a Dataset zawng zawngah interoperability a siam thei a, data khauh tak tak a zawm a, a fuih bawk tehfung insem darhna.

  • Language: NDAP hi India tawng lian 22-ah chuan hman theih a ni a, English chu default a ni. He option hmang hian i duh duh ṭawngkam i thlak thei a ni.

CatalogueQ1: Navigation menu-ah hian ‘Catalogue’ tih hi eng nge ni?
CatalogueA1:
'Catalogue' click-naah hian sector leh ministry zawng zawnga dataset inventory kimchang tak i hmu ang. Listed datasets te hi collection hrang hrang hnuaiah logically categorized an ni a, eng computer pawha folder chhunga file inang lo tak tak an inrual dan ang chiah hian. Collection pakhat i thlang thei a, chu collection chhunga datasets te chu i explore thei a, a nih loh leh dataset chu direct-in i thlang thei a, chu dataset chhunga dimension leh indicator hrang hrangte chu i explore thei bawk.

Page veilam sir hian filter list a nei a, chu chu a ni thei ang. Eng dataset nge listed tih refine nan hman thin:

  • Time period: Filters Hun bituk atanga zawn result
  • Frequency: Filters NDAP-a update tam dan a zirin a zawng chhuak
  • Granularity : Filters Search results based on geographical granularity (i.e., state, district, sub-district, etc.).
  • Ministry: Filters Ministry atanga zawn chhuah
  • Sector: Filters Search Sector hmanga result

DatasetQ1: Dataset page tih hi eng nge ni?
DatasetA1:
Dataset page hian Dataset chungchang chipchiar taka hriat theihna bakah data thlirlet leh hmuh theihna option a pe bawk. He page hian tab pathum a nei a:

  • Profile Tab
  • Data Tab
  • Visualization Tab

Page hian a pe bawk Tab zawng zawnga a chung bera Dataset awmte chu Share, Bookmark, Subscribe leh Download/Export tih theihna option te a awm bawk.
DatasetQ2: Profile tab ah hian eng information nge awm?
DatasetA2:
Profil tab hian Dataset chungchang tlangpui a pe a. Section pathum a awm a:
  • Overview: Dataset sawifiahna chu ‘Source Link’ hnuaiah data original source link te nen a pe a, he section hian ‘More Details’
  • hnuaiah pawn lam documentation a siam bawk Data Preview: Dimension leh Indicator zawng zawng awmna data table preview a pe
  • Metadata: Dimension leh Indicator tinte chungchang hriat belh duh tan a pe tih a ni.
DatasetQ3: Data Table tab ah hian eng information nge awm?
DatasetA3: Data Table tab ah hian data tak tak a rawn lang a, i duh duh column te chu filter leh select theih a ni a, data table ah a lang thei bawk.
DatasetQ4: Dataset hi tabular format-ah engtin nge ka en theih ang?
DatasetA4: Data chu data table tab-ah tabular format-in a en theih a;
DatasetQ5: Visualization tab ah hian eng information nge awm?
DatasetA5:
Visualization tab hian format hrang hranga data hmuh theihna tur option a pe che a: Pie charts, Pivot tables, etc. Data Table tab-a filtering emaw condition emaw hman apiang chu Visualization tab-ah a carry over ang. On. Visualization tab-ah chuan i duh angin i graph siam turin i duh angin i filter thei ang a, i aggregate thei ang a, i configure thei bawk ang.A hnuaia visualization option te hi a awm a:
  • Line Chart
  • Column Chart
  • Bubble Chart
  • Pie Chart
  • Scatter Chart
  • Map thlir dan
  • < b>Pivot Table
  • Tree Map
  • Auto Select: He option hian chart dik tak chu a siam chhuak nghal vek a ni i thlan chhuah
DatasetQ6: Dataset pakhat metadata hi khawiah nge ka hmuh theih ang?
DatasetA6: Dataset pakhata metadata chu dataset detail page-a ‘profile’ tab hnuaia ‘Metadata’ section-ah a awm a.
DatasetQ7: Dataset pakhat metadata hian eng nge a neih?
DatasetA7:
Profil tab hnuaia Metadata section hian Dataset chhunga Dimension leh Indicator zawng zawng information a tarlang a. A hnuaia tarlan te hi variable chi hrang hrang tana metadata details pek te chu a ni:

“Dimensions”

  • Unique: Dataset-a he column-a value danglam bik awm zat
  • Missing: The Dataset-a he column-a value awm zat (i.e., Dimension hrang hrang tana value nei lo record emaw row emaw zat)

“Indicators”

  • Min: Dataset chhunga Indicator value tlem ber
  • Max: Dataset chhunga Indicator value sang ber
  • li>
  • Mean: Dataset chhunga Indicator value mean (average)
  • Median: Dataset chhunga Indicator awm zat median
  • Aggregation function: Aggregation chu a thil hmuhchhuah tam tak awmzia nei thei mathematical operation i n a value pakhat chauh a ni. Entirnan, India rama state awm zawng zawng zat kan khaikhawm chuan ‘sum’ chu aggregation function a ni ang. Metadata table-a aggregation function tarlan chu pre-processing, analysis, leh visualisation zawng zawnga chu Indicator bik atana hman tur default function a ni. Aggregation function hman theih turte chu Sum, Min, Max, Avg, Standard Deviation (Stdev), Count, leh Weighted Avg te an ni.
DatasetQ8: Engtin nge dataset ka download theih ang?
DatasetA8:
Dataset pumpui hi main dataset page atang hian download theih a ni a, profile tab hnuaia ‘Export Dataset’ tih kha click la.

‘Export Dataset’ i click hnuah i device-a .zip folder download tawh chu i hmu ang. Folder-ah hian a hnuaia file pangate hi a awm a (chutah chuan chu dataset pakhat tana digit pali hriat theihna tur a ni a):

  • _metadata.csv: Dataset chhunga column zawng zawng chungchanga metadata information
  • _KEYS.CSV: Original source zawng zawng inkara mappings te khaikhawmna table Administrative unit leh Standardized Local Government Directory (LGD) administrative unit te pawh a awm bawk. Numerical Weights hian unit tin map atanga fraction hrang hrang, original source data atanga standardized LGD units thlenga eng fraction nge a pek dan tur a pe a
  • source_data.csv: original source data chu original administrative identifiers nen, NDAP format angin structured a ni.
  • ndap_report_.csv: NDAP-a kan hmuh angin LGD unit-te tana standardized a nih tawh data hnuhnung ber
  • readme.txt: File hrang hrang chhunga file leh variable awm zawng zawngte chungchang hriattirna Zip folder

Table chhunga filter i apply hnuah pawh data subset i download thei bawk. ‘Table’ tab hnuaia ‘Export Dataset’ tih click chuan, filtered data download link chu NDAP-a email-id registered-ah a share a ni.
DatasetQ9: Dataset standardisation result emaw report emaw khawiah nge ka hmuh theih ang?
DatasetA9: DataSet page-a Profile tab-a ‘View Processing Report’ tih kha click la, dataset standardization atana hman technique nena inzawm information chu i hmu thei ang.

He 'readme.txt’ file-ah hian zip folder-a file awm zawng zawng leh a chhunga thil awmte chungchang hriat tur a awm a.

DatasetQ18: Column chart plot nan hian dimension engzat nge ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA18: Column chart plot nan dimension hnih aia tam lo i hmang thei ang.
DatasetQ19: Engtikah nge pie chart ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA19: Pie chart hi a vawi khatnaah chuan, numerical indicator pakhat atan chauh hman theih a ni.
DatasetQ20: Pie chart-a label awm zat chu engzat nge ni ang?
DatasetA20: Pie chart-a label awm zat chu 10 a ni.
DatasetQ21: Pie chart-ah eng ang variable nge ka plot theih ang?
DatasetA21: Pie chart-ah hian aggregation type count emaw sum emaw numerical indicator chauh a lang thei.
DatasetQ22: Engtikah nge thing map ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA22: Tree map chu rectangle-based visualization a ni a, chu chuan hierarchically-ordered dataset a entir tha ber a ni.
DatasetQ23: Tree map ah hian numerical variable emaw series engzat nge ka plot theih ang?
DatasetA23: Tree map ah hian numerical variable emaw series emaw pakhat chauh i plot thei.
DatasetQ24: Engtikah nge line chart ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA24: Line chart hi hun kal zelah value emaw value engemaw zat emaw a inthlak theihna tur a ni.
DatasetQ25: Line chart-ah hian variable series engzat nge ka plot theih ang?
DatasetA25: Line chart-ah variable series pakhat aia tam (1) i plot thei ang.
DatasetQ26: Line chart-a line awm zat chu engzat nge ni ang?
DatasetA26: Line chart-a line awm zat chu 10 a ni.
DatasetQ27: Engtikah nge scatter chart ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA27: Scatter chart hi numerical indicator pahnih inzawmna enfiah leh entir nan hman a ni.
DatasetQ28: Engtikah nge bubble chart ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA28: ‘Scatter plot’ extension, bubble chart hi numeric variable pathum inkara inzawmna hmuh theihna atan hman a ni tlangpui.
DatasetQ29: Engtikah nge geo-map ka hman theih ang?
DatasetA29: Geo-maps hmang hian administrative unit polygons hmanga data hmuh theih a ni.
DatasetQ30: India ram administrative unit te state leh/ emaw district ang chi te hmuh theihna kawng tha ber chu eng nge ni?
DatasetA30: State leh/ emaw district ang chi Indian administrative unit te hmuh theih dan tha ber chu geo-map hmanga hmuh theih a ni.
DatasetQ31: Plot emaw chart emaw pakhatah unit of measure hrang hrang variable ka hmang thei ang em?
DatasetA31: Ni lo, plot emaw chart emaw pakhatah unit of measure hrang hrang i hmang thei lo.
DatasetQ32: Nested hierarchical data en tur chart tha ber chu eng nge ni?
DatasetA32: Tree map hi hierarchical data en theihna tur visualization format tha ber a ni.
DatasetQ33: Dataset page a Visualization tab ah hian data hi ka filter thei ang em?
DatasetA33: ‘Visualisation’ tab hnuaia filter option kha thlang la, data i filter thei ang.
DatasetQ34: Chart-ah chuan logarithmic-ah ka switch thei ang em?
DatasetA34: Axis eng pawh hi logarithmic ah i convert thei a, dinglam atanga ‘Chart Options’ tih kha thlang la, ‘Loarithmic X Axis’ emaw ‘Loarithmic Y Axis’ emaw zingah i thlang thei ang.
DatasetQ35: Chart pakhata rawng hrang hrangte hi ka thlak thei ang em?
DatasetA35: ‘Chart Options’ hnuaia ‘colour theme’ dang thlangin chart-a colour combination chu i thlak thei ang.
DatasetQ36: Visualization format pakhat atanga a dang ah ka inthlak thei ang em?
DatasetA36: ‘Chart Options’ hnuaia drop-down atang hian i duh zawk visualization format i thlang thei ang.
DatasetQ37: Social media-a data hmuh theihna tur chart-te hi ka share thei ang em?
DatasetA37: Social media platform-a chart-te chu ‘Share’ tih click-in i share thei ang.
DatasetQ38: Data hmuh theihna tur chart ka download thei ang em?
DatasetA38: Chart te chu ‘Download Visualisation’ tih kha click la, image format-in i download thei ang.
DatasetQ39: Visualisation plot nana hman tawh data chu khawiah nge ka hmuh theih ang?
DatasetA39: Visualization plot nana data hman chu chart hnuaiah page khatah hmuh theih a ni.
DatasetQ40: Raw data chu eng nge ni?
DatasetA40: Raw data chu a source - sorkar ministry leh department atanga dataset lakchhuah a ni.
DatasetQ41: Key dimension chu eng nge ni?
DatasetA41: Data table-a key(s) dimension column(s) chu dataset-a record/row tinte danglam taka hriat theihna atana column(s) mamawh a ni.
DatasetQ42: Dataset-a column awmte chu engtin nge categorised an nih?
DatasetA42:
Dataset-a column awmte chu a hnuaia chi hrang hrangah then a ni:
  • - Key Dimensions : Data table-a thil hmuh chhuah danglam bik sawifiahna atana hmun (Geographic Dimension) emaw hun chhung (Temporal Dimension) emaw tarlanna Dimension column-te chu heng Dimension-te hi NDAP dataset zawng zawngah standardized a ni a, common, standardized NDAP data schema chu a sawifiah a ni .
  • - Dimension Dangte: Data table-a hmun emaw hun emaw tih loha thil hmuhchhuah danglam tak sawifiahna tur key descriptive characteristic dang awmna Dimension column-te chu heng Dimension-te hi standardized a ni lo format bik pakhatah dah la, mahse original source data
-a hman schema chu zawm rawh
DatasetQ43: Engtin nge NDAP ah hian dataset pakhat ka merge theih ang?
DatasetA43: Dataset detail page-a Profile tab-a ‘Merge Datasets’ tih i thlan chuan dataset pathum thleng i merge thei ang.
DatasetQ44: Scaling tih hi eng nge ni?
DatasetA44:
Scaling tih hian graphical axes-a marking inkara inhlat dan a kawk a. Scaling mode pahnih a awm a:
  • Uniform Scaling: Tick-mark tin inkar gap chu axis pumpuiah inang tlangin tihpun a ni a, entirnan, axis uniform scaling 1 nei chuan hetiang hian a ziak ang: [1, 2, 3, 4, ...]
  • Logarithmic Scaling: Tick-mark tin inkar gap chu exponential scale-ah tihpun a ni a, entirnan, base 10 logarithmic scale nei axis chuan hetiang hian a chhiar ang: [ , 101, 102, 103...] emaw, [0, 10, , ...]
DatasetQ45: Metadata hi ka download thei ang em?
DatasetA45: Dataset pakhata metadata chu dataset detail page atang chauhin i download thei a, dinglamah ‘Export to Excel’ tih kha click la.
MergeQ1: Datasets merge tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?
MergeA1: Dataset Detail page chung berah ‘Merge Datasets’ tih kha click la, dataset pathum atanga a tam ber atanga data tables te chu i combine thei ang.
MergeQ2: Hmun hrang hrang atanga datasets te hi ka merge thei em (grinularity filter hmangin)?
MergeA2: Ni e, location-level granularities hrang hrang nei dataset pahnih i merge thei bawk.
MergeQ3: Datasets merging lai hian engvangin nge an aggregate thin?
MergeA3: Datasets hi merging laiin aggregate a ni a, a chhan chu dimensions te hi dik taka inmil a ngai a ni.
MergeQ4: Merge process chhung hian eng aggregations function nge hman thin tih hi ka control thei ang em?
MergeA4: Ni e, merging laiin indicator tinte tan aggregation function i thlang thei.
MergeQ5: Merge-naah hian aggregation function hrang hrang awm thei te chu engte nge ni?
MergeA5: Datasets merging hunah aggregation function eng pawh i thlang thei ang: Min, max, mean, sum, emaw weighted average (weighted AVG) population, land area, etc. te hmanga weighted theih a ni.
MergeA5a: Datasets merging lai hian a hnuaia aggregate function te hi a awm thei.
MergeQ6: Datasets merging lai hian indicator te hi ka thlang thei em?
MergeA6: Awle;Datasets merging hunah Indicator awm zawng zawng chu vawi khatah i thlang thei a, Dataset tin atang hian Indicator mamawh chu manual-in i thlang thei bawk.
MergeQ7: Merge process chhung hian filter ka apply thei em?
MergeA7: Dataset pahnih inzawmkhawm hunah filter i apply thei a, merge page a veilam pane ah ‘Customise filters and indicators’ tih kha click la.
MergeQ8: ‘Quick Merge’ tih hi eng nge ni?
MergeA8: ‘Quick Merge’ hmang hian parameters manual configure ngai lovin merge result i hmu thei a ni.
MergeQ9: Merge result hi nakin lawka reference atan ka save thei ang em?
MergeA9: Ni e, dataset merging atanga resultant dataset chu a rawn lang leh thei a, chu chu i ‘bookmark’ thei a ni.
MergeQ10: Merging hunah dataset add dan tur?
MergeA10: Merge laiin datasets te chu add emaw edit emaw theih a ni a, page chung bera ‘Edit Merge Configuration’ tih kha click la.
MergeQ11: Merge configuration hi ka customize thei em, ka edit thei ang em?
MergeA11: Left pane-a ‘Customize filters and Indicators’ tih kha click la, merge configuration edit la, datasets i merging hmain filter dang i dah belh thei ang.
MergeQ12: Dataset merging lai hian temporal column emaw time column emaw hi engtin nge an enkawl?
MergeA12: NDAP hian temporal identifier-a data i thlan emaw, i collapse emaw laiin standardized geographic identifiers hmangin datasets a merge a.
MergeQ13: Datasets te hi eng column nge an merge on?
MergeA13: Datasets hi ‘basic merge’ atana geographical dimensions hmanga inzawmkhawm a ni.
MergeQ14: Datasets merging atanga results te hi engtin nge ka hrilhfiah ang?
MergeA14:
'Merge results' page ah hian tab pathum a awm a:
  • Profile tab
    • Metadata inzawmkhawm
    • Dimension filter hman
    • Data preview
      • < li>Metadata (merge process-a hman Dataset-te zinga mi)
  • Data Table tab:
    • Dimension filter hman a ni
    • Data table (pagination nen)
  • Visualise: Dataset inzawmkhawm chu hmuh theih a ni (much zawhna number 25)
-a sawifiah angin Dataset page pakhat ang maiin
MergeQ15: Datasets inzawmkhawm hian ‘Customise filters and indicators’ tih hi eng nge i sawi tum?
MergeA15:
'Customise Filters and Indicators' tih kha click la, hetiang hian i ti thei ang:
  • Indicator pakhat zel a awmte chu i thlang thei ang. Merged Dataset-a lang tur dataset
  • Dataset tin hun chhung tur thlang rawh
  • Hmun thlang rawh
  • Granularity thlak rawh
MergeQ16: Dataset inzawmkhawm hi eng metadata nge a nih?
MergeA16: Merged DataSet page-a metadata section-ah hian data table-a variable hrang hrangte chungchang information a awm a.
MergeQ17: Datasets inzawmkhawm hunah temporal column emaw time dimension emaw-ah filter hman tur a ni em?
MergeA17: Ni e, datasets inzawmkhawm hunah temporal column emaw time dimension emaw-a filter hman hi thil tih ngei ngei tur a ni.
UserProfileQ1: User profile page hi eng nge ni?
UserProfileA1:
User profile page-ah hian i bookmark emaw i subscribe emaw theih Datasets te a awm a:
  • Bookmarks: Datasets bookmarked by you for quick and easy reference
  • Subscriptions: Dataset emaw Collection emaw hriattirna i enable tawh

    • Hetah hian i password thlak tur te, profile picture upload tur te, user type tarlan tur te pawh i click thei bawk.
UserProfileQ2: Engtin nge dataset atang hian ka unsubscribe theih ang?
UserProfileA2: Dataset i subscribe tawh apiang chu i profile page-a subscription hnuaiah tile-ah a lang ang.
UserProfileQ3: Engtin nge datasets ka track duh tan email alerts ka schedule theih ang?
UserProfileA3: Email alerts dawng duh dataset(s) chu i bookmark hmasa tur a ni.
UserProfileQ4: Bookmark ka delete thei ang em?
UserProfileA4: Dataset i bookmark tawh apiang chu i profile page-a bookmark hnuaiah tile-ah a lang ang.

AccessibilityPara2: Device hman lai, technology emaw theihna emaw thliar lovin National Data & Analytics Platform (NDAP) chu a hmangtu zawng zawngte tan hman theih a nih theih nan kan inpeih reng a ni.
AccessibilityPara3: Standards zawm leh usability leh universal design principle zawm kan tum bawk a, hei hian he website tlawhtu zawng zawngte tan a puih tur a ni

DatasetTab:
Datasets

'Dataset' chu source pakhat atanga data output table pakhat, inzawm tlat a ni. Dataset pakhata row tin hi a danglam bik a ni. observation while each column is a variable.Dataset tin hian column chi hnih a nei a, chungte chu: Dimensions leh Indicators te an ni.

Dimension

‘Dimension’ hian a danglam bik taka hriat theihna tur variable mamawh a kawk a ni a single observation in a Dataset.Entirnan, Dataset pakhatah India rama state tin tan row pakhat a awm a nih chuan, ‘state’ column chu Dimension a ni ang a, row tin chu state danglam bik

Indicator-a mi a nihzia chiang takin a tarlang ang

‘Indicator’ tih hian thil hmuhchhuah danglam bik tinte aspect engemaw zat sawifiahtu variable a kawk a, indicator te chu categorical, numerical, emaw string variable te pawh a ni thei.Entirnan, India rama state tinte tana population report-tu Dataset-ah , 'population' chu Indicator

He platform hmang hian State hrang hranga administrative landscape zau tak atanga data set te chu a lut thei a ni. KADAP hian dataset te chu a zawng thei a, a inzawm khawm thei a, a hmu thei a, a download thei bawk awlsam takin.
